titleStmt.title: Sir William Breretons letter sent to the Honoble William Lenthal Esq; Speaker of the Honorable House of Commons. Concerning all the passages and treaties of the siege and taking of the city of Chester· And by Mr. Speaker appointed to be printed and published. With a most exact declaration of Chesters enlargement after three yeers bondage, set forth by Nathanael Lancaster, chaplein to the Cheshire forces.
titleStmt.author: Brereton, William, Sir, 1604-1661.
Lancaster, Nathaniel, 1600 or 1601-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edw. Husband, printer to the Honorable House of Commons, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Golden Dragon in Fleetstreet, neer the Inner-Temple.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Golden Dragon in Fleetstreet, neer the Inner-Temple.
